volunteering.more: During my years of volunteering, I have been able to gain a deep understanding of the challenges these individuals face on a daily basis. I have been able to provide emotional support, comfort, and companionship. I also had the opportunity to help organize activities and events. My time spent volunteering has given me a profound appreciation for the beauty of human relationships and for the strength and resilience of the human spirit.

MS Project.moreInfo: Used extensively for planning one a daily basis.

MS Office.moreInfo: Used extensively for project management, documentation, and communication.

OneNote/Trello.moreInfo: Used for project management, task tracking, and team collaboration.

Dalux.moreInfo: Used for handling project packages with vendors, change management, technical queries and payment requests.

MS Copilot.moreInfo: Daily handling of emails, meetings, framing agendas and content creation with the help of Artificial Intelligence.

Managing High-Cost Projects.moreInfo: Context-switching between 11 different process equipment packages with a budget up to 200mio dkk. Laser Cutting 45 tons of aluminum sheet metal.

People Skills.moreInfo: I am skilled in building positive relationships with customers and colleagues. I can empathise with customers, meet their specific needs, as well as efficiently collaborate with my colleagues to achieve the company goals.

Continuous Learning.moreInfo: I can adapt to new technologies, tools, and methodologies as they evolve. I am always eager to learn and grow, which has allowed me to stay ahead in my field.

Process optimization.moreInfo: Naturally driven by curiosity and a desire to continuously improve processes and find better solutions. I have a strong track record of identifying inefficiencies and implementing effective solutions.

Testing and troubleshooting.moreInfo: Implementing ideas on fixing problems, and improving time management and efficiency. I have a keen eye for detail and a methodical approach to problem-solving.

Warehouse management.moreInfo: For all materials in the iron industry. I have experience managing inventory, ensuring proper storage, and maintaining accurate records.

Communication and Collaboration.moreInfo: Experienced in collaborating with multidisciplinary teams and thriving in diverse and professional environments. I excel at building relationships and fostering a positive team dynamic.

Project Management.moreInfo: Plan, organize, lead and execute engineering projects. This involves managing resources, planning, setting direction and ensuring successful project completion. I have a proven track record of delivering projects on time and within budget.

Technical Drawing and Documentation.moreInfo: Creation of Tender Document Lists and Technical Tender Specifications, Supplier inspections, quality plans etc. I have a strong understanding of technical documentation and its importance in project success.

Detail-Oriented.moreInfo: My approach to checking involves exploring various methods to reach the desired outcome, rather than simply repeating past actions. By meticulously verifying each step, I ensure the highest level of accuracy and quality in my work. This has resulted in a strong track record of success and a reputation for producing exceptional work.

Fast learner.moreInfo: I adapt fast to change. I switched from the Mechanical Department into the PM Department in NNE within 7 months. I successfully learned Bysoft, prepared cost proposals, managed the invoice process, identified areas for improvement, and implemented changes quickly within one month of joining SSK Metal, despite the challenge.

English (C2).moreInfo: I have obtained the certificate of proficiency in English from the University of Michigan. I am fluent in English and I've been working with all-english speaking people for several years full-time and I continue speaking and writing English often.

Danish (B2).moreInfo: I have been living in Denmark since September 2023 and I am currently taking a Danish course. I can communicate verbally in Danish in a basic level and understand quite some more.

Albanian (native).moreInfo: My parents are speaking natively Albanian and taught me how to speak since I was a baby.

German (A1).moreInfo: I'm mostly self-taught; I can communicate verbally in German in a basic level and understand quite some more.

Italian (A2).moreInfo: I've been learning Italian since the start of 2022 and I love them too much to abandon them anytime soon.

Greek (native).moreInfo: I've been living in Greece since I was 1 year old and I received a Greek education.

interests.name: Writing
interests.description: The trees at winter look like vains that feed the air. Like roots that turned the other way. Don't look like that, just go and see, when looking at the nature you might see me. We are all one, energy and flesh from the same gem. And that's not strange it's another way, to see that, we're all around and vibrate like waves, so let's go and float and not just gaze. By E.O.

interests.name: Macro Photography
